definitions.definition: A bright green, biennial herb , Petroselinum crispum , having many cultivars .
The leaves of this plant used in Middle Eastern, European , and American cooking.
Any herb resembling parsley, such as cilantro ( Chinese parsley ) or chervil ( French parsley ).

main_definition: ( countable , uncountable ) A bright green, biennial herb , Petroselinum crispum , having many cultivars .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The leaves of this plant used in Middle Eastern, European , and American cooking.
( by extension , loosely ) Any herb resembling parsley, such as cilantro ( Chinese parsley ) or chervil ( French parsley ).
